Reviews.Title: Amazing camera for the size!
Reviews.Author: teds "teds"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  I selected it because I wanted a good camera that could live in my pocket because I don't like carrying around a camera case -makes you a target and you look like a tourist.  You can't put a camera in your pocket that has one of those pop-out lenses because dust gets into them.  Been there, don't that. Needs to be dust proof like this camera. Dont put anything metal in that pocket or you will scratch the thing to heck. Always use the wrist strap so you don't drop it while shooting.Pictures and video are amazing for the size of this thing. Battery lasts about 45 min of continuous shooting/video.  If you need more then get an extra battery for only $10.  I did but I haven't needed it yet!My only con: lens is right where my finger wants to be but I got used to it after a few days.  But be sure to warn people when you hand it over to someone else.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, for being low end.
Reviews.Author: J.F.
Reviews.Content: I received the camera quickly from Amazon.com and I was impressed how the packaging was done from sony, tight, small, minimal.I was able to play with this camera for a few days before I finally decided to return it though. The camera takes amazing macro shots up close to a variety of items. The zoom is ok for being 4x optical. I've never owned such a slim camera before, and I was impressed how the zoom didnt extend out of the body. Having the slide up/down cover was also nice for protecting the Carl Zeiss lense.Probably my biggest negative issue with the camera is the touch screen. With other touch screen cameras having multi touch, and being responsive, I felt like I was using a touch screen from 5+ years ago. You had to press hard and where you wanted to touch. I was heavily dissapointed because of the cost of the camera, and how poor the touch screen sensitivity, and resolution was. You can literally see the gaps between each pixel, and it's to the point you cant even tell if you're last shot photo is sharp or not.Another issue was the quality of the images. Sure they're 16.1MP, but they arent the greatest. My old 7MP canon SD1000 took better photos at a smaller file size. A camera this expensive should atleast perform better.For the specs of this camera, I'd look into Sony's other cameras. Let style and thinness slide by this time, get performance and quality in another camera instead.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: Jane Austin
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It is perfection! The quality of the pictures is fantastic and it is so simple. The touchscreen, which I was on the fence about, is extremely responsive. Color is perfect. I would buy it a thousand times over.

Reviews.Title: Sorry, I HATE It!!!
Reviews.Author: Beanboy
Reviews.Content: I thought, hey, Sony Cyber-shot.  Everyone LOVES it.  Can't go wrong?  Right?  Not with mine.  In fact, HALF of every picture is blurry no matter what setting I place it on.  Some pictures, using the flash mode, white out completely.  If the picture isn't blurry and out of focus, it's too bright or too dark.  And low light pictures are horrible!  I constantly get an annoying message "PROCESSING" in which EVERY photo when it does that is unrecognizable.  Not to mention, after taking maybe, what, 20 pictures the low battery light comes on and the thing literally DIES.  Unbelieveable for 200 dollars.  Skip it and try another model.  This one hasn't been worth the time and frustration for me!!! :(

Reviews.Title: Tiny powerhouse camera!
Reviews.Author: Pam H. "Pam"
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera! I had another touchscreen Sony and wanted to upgrade.  This is TINY, takes amazing pictures and videos, is easy to operate, and the intelligent-automatic won't let you make a mistake.  I am very gentle with my cameras, but found that the playback mode was 'jumping' for some reason.  I guess even Sony can have a glitch but Amazon was awesome.  They had the new one in the mail before I could package the old one up.  I do agree that the lens is a little high and I took a few pictures with my fingers hanging over, but I took care of that.  After 3 weeks and a lot of summer pictures I did not have one red eye, not one blurred picture, and the battery life is fantastic.  My old Sony touch-screen allowed me to crop and save on the camera, but this one doesn't do that. It does allow for panaramic view pictures and the videos I took in the sun and toward twilight were perfect.  I'm hoping the replacement camera will come soon ... and the fact that I had to replace a camera after 3 weeks of easy use (with case for protection) is why I gave it 4 starts.  The actual useage I experienced would qualify for 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera..grest value for its price...great quality...
Reviews.Author: A10
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome...1. What's in the box:*Multi Connector Cable*Battery (NP-BN1)*Paint Pen*Battery Charger (BC-CSN)*Wrist Strapyou can watch this video from Sony...it shows how the unboxing of the camera..[...]2. Sizewhat i love about it is its size...i was afraid the camera was too small for my big hands...but when i used it..i fell in love it..(93.0mm x 55.6mm x 16.8mm)..you can carry it around wherever you go..you can put it in your pocket..purse..etc...3. Ease of usei read some reviews about people complaining about the ease-of-use of this camera..or that the instruction manual is not that good..to be frank..i've never read it..cause it's very easy to get to know all the features in your camera and how to use them..just play around with it for a couple of hours..and believe me..you'll get to know everything:)4. Touch ScreenThe touch screen is awesome..and very responsive...i bought a protective cover for it (BoxWave Sony Cyber-shot DSC-T110 ClearTouch Anti-Glare Screen Protector (Single Pack) ) for 6.25$ and the touch screen was still very responsive even after i applied the cover to the touch screen..i recommend you buy one to protect your touch screen.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000KN1IC6/ref=oh_o06_s00_i00_details5. BatteryThe battery life is not that good..but you can always buy an extra battery, which i did (BestDealUSA NP-BN1 Battery for Sony CyberShot DSC-TX9 TX5 WX5 TX7) for about 6$http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005J9YLAC/ref=oh_o01_s00_i00_details6. Quality of pictures and videosOne word: awesome...HD movies...great pics when shooting at 16mp...PS: when shooting at 16mp..you will not have full screen...unlike when shooting videos..you can zoom while shooting videos..what i like the most..is that the lens does not come out and in as most of the cameras...as this might cause lots of problems (some lenses freeze in cold and get stuck)the pics quality was nice in low light places..the auto mode can make your life easier..even in dark places.7. Featuresi love the sweep panorama feature...there are 3 levels of smile detection..there are multiple modes...you can change the color of the menu (white, black, and pink)..and you can read the rest of the product details on the product details...8. Notes*The delivery took only 3 days.*always use the wrist strap when shooting images or videos..you don't want your camera to fell down..*Buy a carrying case for it..i recommend (Sony LCS-CST General Purpose Soft Carrying Case for Slim Cybershot Digital Cameras)which is great for the T110.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00091S0WA/ref=oh_o02_s00_i00_details*I also recommend you buy (Sony 8 GB PRO-HG Duo HX Memory Stick MSHX8A (Black))which i also bought for my T110...http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003F8UWUM/ref=oh_o05_s00_i00_detailsBottom line: great camera..worths the 150-170$...easy to use..easy to carry around...nice features...HD movies..great quality pics...i highly recommend it

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: rox
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  Many features.  Panoramic mode is great & the video quality & great.The only drawback (& I'm not sure how it compares to other cameras), but it might be a tad slow on snapping the shot.  I have kids & it's hard to get the perfect pic, so I have to snap right before what I think will be perfect timing...but I'm sure it's the same with other cameras...

Reviews.Title: Solid Camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: We buy new cameras every 2 years. I did a little research, and this camera had some descent reviews at several consumer sites. We take a lot of photos and I bought this camera for my wife to carry in her purse. The camera is small, light, and takes better pictures than I expected. I am not crazy about the slide cover, and would have preferred an automatic slide on the lens, but it is nice that the cover turns the camera on and off. I recommend this camera and would buy it again. I do recommend buying a case or something to keep it in to prevent the touchscreen from being scratched. Do not buy the cases through Sony, because you will pay considerably more than on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Devastated
Reviews.Author: Timon Elliott Jr
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed my camera initially.  Took beautiful pictures ans videos.  Imagine my dismay on my vacation when the LCD screen went out and my camera was useless.  I hope this is just me having a faulty lemon cause I liked the sleekness of this item.

Reviews.Title: Tiny camera, HUGE value!
Reviews.Author: Pam H. "Pam"
Reviews.Content: This is a tiny camera with a lot of ability.  It has 16.1 megapizels for spectacular pictures and it's easy to use.  It has a touchscreen that is easy to follow (instead of a lot of buttons and wheels).  I was able to take videos, a panaramic picture, and back to a regular picture with the touch of the screen.  It has face recognition, so even when you are taking a picture with lighting behind your subject, the face comes out great.  It will fit in the tiniest purse, but has all the options of the bigger cameras. I just love it.  The only downside is the red-eye reduction feature which slows down the picture and becomes a bit annoying, but the final picture is beautiful. Worth the money and free shipping too!!

Reviews.Title: packs a punch for price
Reviews.Author: sic5hifter "sic5hifter"
Reviews.Content: used to own a Canon PowerShot SD780 IS 12.1MP 3X Optical Zoom. I liked that camera a lot. It served its purpose very well and it's very sleek and compact.This Sony pretty much have everything that i liked about my Canon plus the handy Touchscreen function and wide-angle lens. I liked this camera more now.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Debweb
Reviews.Content: Just received this camera and despite some of the reviews, I think this camera takes excellent pictures!  The color is rich and sharp.  The touch screen makes it easy to use.  I would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Debra A. Greaney
Reviews.Content: So simple even an old blonde can take great pictures!  Works well in all light, indoors and out.  The software was a little scary at first, but it turned out to be easy to use.  I like the way it allows you to share photos and video online with one click.

Reviews.Title: Perfect purse camera
Reviews.Author: J Mabary
Reviews.Content: It is so small, so easy to use and takes great pics.  I love the purple too, I always know which is my camera because several of my friends have the same camera.  I am still getting the hang of the arm-extended-self-portrait - it is not as easy to grip and snap.  But otherwise, I am liking it and downloading photos has been super easy.

Reviews.Title: nice camara
Reviews.Author: shena
Reviews.Content: beatiful and very practical camera, very nice color, the product seems to be new and in a good condition I only wish the battery could last more time.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera...does take a little training, however.
Reviews.Author: Alan J. Ulicny
Reviews.Content: Got this as a replacement for an older Sony DSC camera that had been dropped too many times and wouldn't operate consistently (my 9yr-old son now uses it for his budding photography career). So far, it works great, but does have so many features and settings that my wife and I are still low on the learning curve but moving up. Got the red Sony because my wife wanted a flashy (no pun intended) camera and I wanted a good one. My only complaint is that the front cover is so thin that it is sometimes difficult to slide down quickly for that "spontaneous" shot. Other than that, 5 stars and two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Good pictures for the size - but has proprietary cable.
Reviews.Author: Richard Culleton
Reviews.Content: I used this camera for the first time while I was on vacation in Prague. The quality of the pictures taken outdoors are as good or better than you would expect from a camera with a lens this size. They images are more than adequate for Facebook and printing 4x6s. Photos taken in lower light conditions are grainy but not any more so than I would expect.This review would have been 4 stars if it were not for one single problem. The camera ships without a charger but does include what looks like a micro USB cable.The included cable is actually NOT a micro USB cable but a proprietary Sony cable that looks like micro USB. Having brought only a mini and micro USB to charge everything else I own I was unable to charge the camera.I spent three hours scouting the tourist areas of Prague for a means to charge this camera. I finally gave up and paid twice retail for another camera to use for the remainder of my trip.When I returned home I bought a universal battery charger. I must have figured I had plenty of micro USB cables and tossed the cable that came in the box. If I travel with this camera again I will bring a pocket full of charged Sony 'N' batteries.I can't begin to understand why Sony would do something like this. I thought they would have learned their lesson with the Sony memory stick saga. They have taken another pretty good product a degraded it by making it inconvenient and/or expensive to use.Rick CulletonCEO DiscountElectronics.com

Reviews.Title: Was a alright camera
Reviews.Author: Domenick
Reviews.Content: It is very small and compact but the night feature was very poor. If you are taking pictures during the day this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Horrible screen touch respond
Reviews.Author: Akalianax4
Reviews.Content: Different color than in picture. In picture it shown light pink but when i got it, it is darker pink. too slow to take picture and slow respond when i click on touchscreen.but nice quaintly picture but again it doesn't adjust night mode.

Reviews.Title: Looks better than it is....
Reviews.Author: Paul P.
Reviews.Content: I love the looks and and compact feel of this camera, but the picture quality is very disapointing.  Sony usually has top shelf compact cameras, but this one was a big 'Oops'.

Reviews.Title: Exquisite
Reviews.Author: Osagie G.
Reviews.Content: I love the Cyber-shot and its great and I would love to continue buying stuff like this on amazon, hopefully sometimes soon

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: This camera is in excellent item, i had no problems with it and was exactly what i was looking for.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Lamar D Brown
Reviews.Content: Loved the price, this item is hard to find in IL. I like to thank the sender for sending it to me in a timly fashion.

Reviews.Title: EASY TO CARRY GREAT PICTURES!
Reviews.Author: joseph2221
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for it's tiny size and ease of use!  Do  you like taking great pictures but hate lugging a bulky camera around? This camera has your name all over it!

Reviews.Title: it's super camera
Reviews.Author: Kishan Patel
Reviews.Content: i like this camera it has good qualityit has a good quality of 16.1 mp so it take a good picture

Reviews.Title: nice!
Reviews.Author: dean m yuba
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife (the pink one) shipped fast and seems like a nice compact camera and the lens cover feature is a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: mary "mb"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my son. He loves it. It has MANY different fun features, as well as taking great pictures. I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT GIFT
Reviews.Author: PJ
Reviews.Content: IT WAS A GIFT FOR MY MOM.SHE LOVES SLEEK AND SMALL HANDY THINGS.MAN SHE LOVED THIS GIFT.THE PACKAGE CAME RIGHT ON TIME AND MY MOM IS HAVING AN AMAZING TIME WITH THE NEW CAM.SHE IS IN "LOVE" WITH IT.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: SK Carpenter
Reviews.Content: I do a lot of indoor shooting without flash and this little camera does a great job of it! I highly recommend it for overall use!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Zep "Sparrow"
Reviews.Content: I get this camera a day ago and the pictures are great,has a lot of options,the camera looks great the touchscreen is nice and easy to use,this shipping was really fast ,if you are looking for a good camera but don't have much money this is for you ,I recommend this product,

Reviews.Title: AWESOME MINI camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Samurai
Reviews.Content: This LITTLE camera packs quite a punch! Now, I stress LITTLE because the physical size is quite small. The touch screen can be maneuvered with the users finger, however it is more accurate to use the stylus that comes with the camera that attaches to the hand strap. For a point and shoot camera it takes great photos as well as decent videos. I'd say this camera would be great for just an everyday camera, and for someone who has had some experience with digital cameras since it does have some features that are for more advanced photography.

Reviews.Title: Performance
Reviews.Author: Zanim Mohammed
Reviews.Content: Light weight and easy to use. It proved to be an efficient camera that is taking out great pictures. A very handy camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: ok i bought it
Reviews.Content: could not find this in a brick and mortar store...because it is so good they would not be able to sell any other camera...nice touch screen control....

Reviews.Title: It's good for the price
Reviews.Author: Jacky
Reviews.Content: It's  a great cyber shot camara it's a little thicker than I expected but over all it shipped on time and was the same shade of color I requested.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: fancylynn5
Reviews.Content: it arrived really fast in four day smaller than thought but it was just right will order again thanks so much

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-T110 16.1 MP Digital Still Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Labate
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera with lots of features for my wife to grab those special first moment of our newborn baby girl! All good things to say about: sleek design, easy to use, durable, high quality LCD screen (quite large), and 16.1MP <--- that's the ticket! We took some photos and viewed them on a 65" plasma TV.. the photos were incredible. I've not yet tested the HD video function so I cannot comment on that as yet. So far so good--I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: A Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: glp
Reviews.Content: Very good picture quality.  Easy to use and download pictures.  Easy to carry.  The only problem I had was seeing the touch screen in bright sunlight, which is probably partly a function of my sunglasses.  I am very pleased with the camera and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: SONY CYBER-SHOT DSC-T110
Reviews.Author: J. Tolleson
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera. Just a little bigger than a credit card.  This camera was a gift so I haven't used it myself but I was impressed with what it can do for such a small item.  Great price from Amazon too.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA. I'VE NEVER HAD ONE PROBLEM WITH IT
Reviews.Author: ARIEL ehh ASHLEY
Reviews.Content: I DIDN'T GET IT FROM AMAZONI GOT THIS CAMERA FROM BEST BUY FOR MY 19TH BIRTHDAYAND FOR THIS WHOLE YEAR NOTHING HAS HAPPENED TO ITVERY EASY TO USEITS NOT ROCKET SCIENCEIF I GETS DIRTY WIPE IT DOWN WITH A CLOTH( THE KINDA CLOTH THAT WOULD COME WITH READING GLASSES )and it gets rid of fingerprints in a blink of an eyei love my sony cybershot t110

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Mr.Pradhan
Reviews.Content: This Sony T110 is a good camera..small with great style and dazzling looks. Picture quality is damn good and as it has got ISO upto 3200..night shoots are simply great. Its has got many wonderful features as Sony always have..,,fits in jeans pocket and its touch screen is very responsive..great small camera I ever had..Recommended to everyone..DON'T THINK JUST GO FOR IT..Thanx.

Reviews.Title: buena
Reviews.Author: KERWUYS
Reviews.Content: me gusto mucho la camara, el estilo la manera y lo rapido que llego desde el pais origen al pais destino.. excelente

Reviews.Title: An awesome camera!!!!!!!!!1
Reviews.Author: NYC Princess
Reviews.Content: Nice pictures! I bought it for my birthday! love the color!!!!!!!!!! u will not regret on buying this camera....I defenitely recommend it!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: If you think you will drop it, don't buy it - I will not buy anything from Sony ever again. Their quality has gone to garbage.
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: I've always loved Sony cameras and have bought 6 in my life and recommended them to people. They always were durable and pictures were good quality. Be aware their company is no longer what it was.This camera (DSC-T110) took good pictures and I liked it cause it's small. But it is not durable at all. After having for only 30 days I dropped it "1 time" from my pocket to the ground, about 4 feet. The screen cracked. Sony told me that is not covered under warranty for dropping it. So the camera still worked at least the screen was just cracked. Now about 30 days later it's making a grinding noise like fan is hitting something and the pictures are all blurry. The motor for the focus must be messed up is my guess. I've dropped my old Sony cameras (such as DSC-T7) many of times and they never broke or anything.I rarely leave bad reviews but this one really made me angry. Sony basically stole $200 from me in 60 days. In a sense I learned to never byu anything from Sony again. Their TVs are a rip off when Samsung's are just as good for less the price. Sony's Android tablet breaks easy from what I've read and the screen is not scratch proof.All Sony products are now cheaply made. The only person I would say is ok with this camera is if you plan to mount it on a wall and never put it in your pocket or have any chance of banging or dropping it.I've heard Canon is a bit more helpful when these break. I'll go with Canon from now on.Goodbye Sony

Reviews.Title: Is this camera compatible with MAC OS X Software?
Reviews.Author: L J "LJ"
Reviews.Content: Does anyone own a MAC with OS X software? And does this camera work with it? Because i used to own a Sony and my apartment was broken into and it was stolen (not sure which model it was). I see all the Sony touch screens i like say they are not compatible with MAC. My Sony touch i had worked on my MAC (i never checked to see if it was ever compatible).  If someone can answer this question that would be great. Thank you.

ProductInfo.Features:
3.0-inch Touch screen for easy focus selection and photo viewing
Sweep Panorama Mode captures stunning panoramic images
Capture your videos in HD Movie mode (720p)
Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x (25mm) optical zoom lens
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-T110 16.1 MP Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x Optical Zoom Lens and 3.0-inch Touchscreen (Pink)
